channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.40 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.40

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicPage: blank space on snap is no longer visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnResizer: Resizer should not be visible when table is busy
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: preserve value after rerendering of password field
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the object page where canceling a direct edit could result in the application remaining in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that returning to an application does not set the default table variant as modified
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterController: correctly restore dtoffset fields when low is used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: no more prevent multi token paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generating filters now respects settings on validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Tokenizer border is now displayed correctly for horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: IconPool: Add more mime-type mappings for MS Excel files
    • Type: FIX, Description: SAP-icons: fix icon 'eam-work-order' in v5
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Reduce minimal font size for FitToPage
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: set Verdana as default font family

item.title: Version 1.108.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.33

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now retaining the semantic date value correctly in the user defined variant on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that 'modifyStartupExtension' changes in the filter bar are retained post refresh
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid making the page variant dirty during external navigation scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the chart selection in smart chart on the analytical list page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: ComboBox valueState is now correctly reset
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Improve PDF export error handling

item.title: Version 1.108.41 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.41

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: Table content mixup when grouping and growing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Reposition ValueStateHeader when long text is set
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: filterChange event is fired with correct value in case of Single Input and ValueList
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: adapt second date value to consider the precision
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.UniversalDateUtils.qunit.js: Improve test stability for different time zones
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.UniversalDateUtils.qunit.js: Fix failing tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.108.42 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.42

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Prevent error when opening menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented

item.title: Version 1.108.43 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.43

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generated filters are now removed from service query
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC: Include AdaptationFilterBar triggerSearch before invalidation

item.title: Version 1.108.44 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.44

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty

item.title: Version 1.108.45 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.45

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now identify the startup parameters when an SAP Fiori elements application is launched as an embedded application from My Inbox

item.title: Version 1.120.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.28

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix failing QUnit test
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Speech output for table suggestions is now enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Appointments text is resized depending of the scale factor now
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when dynamic date range filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable text wrapping for long values in the dropdown of the Editing Status filter field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized the draft popover placement in the table column to improve text visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the correct heading levels were not applied to the smart form titles when the object page control hide the subsection title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the unwanted back navigation button from the message dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Binding context for fixed-value scenarios is now synchronized
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: no caching of metadata with cache buster segment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel#createEntry: ignore transient context if path is absolute
    • Type: FIX, Description: IconPool: Add more mime-type mappings for MS Excel files
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: render as <dl> in display mode
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC.ValueHelp: Popover promise handling improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Typeahed - announce table headers on arrow navigation
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: render as <dl> in display mode

item.title: Version 1.120.32 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.32

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an aria-hidden attribute within Gantt chart to avoid the chart area from getting read out in the accessibility tool
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Add detection for CSS preloads
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: works correctly now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix table flickering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented

item.title: Version 1.120.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.22

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Cancel action works in the operations dialog for strict handling messages in changeset mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now explicitly request the message path for static actions
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also filter the value list description using hidden keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: menu items properties are handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the accessibility issue in aria-required-children within uploadCollection by changing the role 'option' to 'listitem'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.m.Label: when the label is with percent width it works
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Ensure colon and asterisk are always displayed by using flex box
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust tooltip announcement
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with characters that aren't a part of ASCII characters
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: On items load the ComboBox now applies the already set value on specific case
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use duck typing to check DOM element in 'closestTo'
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Console error removed
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove appointments not selected announcement

item.title: Version 1.120.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.23

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the strict handling dialog when an action returns a single warning message with a description or descriptionUrl
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided a fix for the auto proportionate zoom issue that occurred on initial rendering of the Gantt Chart
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of the selected TAccountItems not getting highlighted
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/analytics/AnalyticalBinding#updateAnalyticalInfo: keep attribute properties in additional select

item.title: Version 1.120.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.25

  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the standard variant management where data did not load initially when predefined filter fields were set and Apply Automatically was selected
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted to the chrome://flags/#pdf-oopif flag that is introduced to rectify the pdfViewer issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat is taken into account when formatting the output in 24-hour mode support
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that canceling a direct edit no longer results in being stuck in a busy state
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now invalidating the context of the currently active subobject page during draft activation on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when table filters are applied
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Value is no longer cleared when binding context is changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnnotationHelper: UI.Hidden annotation default value
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the formatting of smart fields in the function import dialog

item.title: Version 1.120.29 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.29

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input, sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Tests on macOS corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Redundant announcement on error state removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Navigate to details view when title is too long
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls with Suggestions: Value State message in header is no longer focusable
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the field visibility and updated the section title display on the object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: creation of instances for date time no longer sets UTC flag to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.FilterBar: Buttons are now visible on 320px screen size
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the focus is not moved to the last control in cases where an action opens a dialog popup

item.title: Version 1.120.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.30

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeSelection: Same separator for both date inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've fixed issue where noDataText and noDataDescription was not getting set correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where changes made to the variant management-enabled table were lost when it was refereshed without saving the variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the selection parameters passed through the URL are correctly applied in analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the label contrast issue for stacked bar micro chart
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupPanel: Show Field as Column fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: filterChange event is fired with correct value in case of Single Input and ValueList
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.120.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.31

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus correctly restored
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the illustratedMessage provided by a user was being overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correct overlap when in text mode
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adaptation project now supports modification of the application-level settings in the SAP delivered apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the message popover remained open even after the item link was clicked
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the Select All checkbox was disabled by introducing a configurable boolean property
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlFactoryBase: support config enabledMultiSelectionPlugin on value help create
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance

item.title: Version 1.120.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.33

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a colon was not being displayed after the label in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the object page stopped responding due to incorrect error message handling
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: isDigitalSequence ComboBox shows "00"
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generated filters are now removed from service query
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: load flex before usage
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix AnchorBar accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Fix fast navigation

item.title: Version 1.120.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: get appointment domref correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLink: Fix navigation to object page with correct parameters
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxpa.ObjectPageSubSection: Improved key handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior

item.title: Version 1.120.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.35

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: The correct ARIA label is now assigned to Object page header forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve removed incorrect ARIA labels that were assigned to the footer of an object page

item.title: Version 1.130.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.9

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the field validation behaved inconsistently within the flexible column layout applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: The appState of the list report is now correctly updated if there are multiple updateAppState calls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the message box was closed before displaying the message popover
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the enableAutoColumnWidth and widthIncludingColumnHeader properties in the manifest.json file when adding a column to a table
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: No duplicate headers appear when users access the S/4 system via a shared card in MS Teams
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now removing the disabled buttons upon updating the toolbar contents
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the JAWS announcement for the nodes of process flow control
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized the draft popover placement in the table column to improve text visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable text wrapping for long values in the dropdown of the Editing Status filter field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when dynamic date range filters are applied

item.title: Version 1.130.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.10

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the strict handling dialog when an action returns a single warning message with a description or descriptionUrl
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that text binding for an externalID with a semantic object works correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where colons were not being displayed after the label in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use the focusOnEditExtension API in object pages to set the focus on a specific control in edit mode

item.title: Version 1.130.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.11

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the responsiveness issue in the gantt chart for chart display type
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed a screen reader issue where empty cells were announced as blank
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the process flow, we've now fixed the navigational issues, and have improved the announcement of empty cells when it is used with screen readers in VPC mode
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the message popover remained open even after the item link was clicked
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now preserve end user's unsaved table personalization by correctly handling empty string variants and retaining modified state after initialization

item.title: Version 1.133.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.3

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the value help didn't work for create and inline create
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: DescriptionOnly paste uses correct type instance
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: zero guid is not exposed in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlFactoryBase: support config enabledMultiSelectionPlugin on value help create
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Binding context for fixed-value scenarios is now synchronized
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Empty Filter for navigation properties

item.title: Version 1.133.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the strict handling dialog when an action returns a single warning message with a description or descriptionUrl
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display all the decimal places for quantities with measures in display mode, with an option to limit the decimal places based on the unit of measure
    • Type: FIX, Description: The appState of the list report is now correctly updated if there are multiple updateAppState calls
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that text binding for an externalID with a semantic object works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now wait for context to be created before extracting the inParameter for the value help dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly apply 1:n association filters when loading variants
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display all the decimal places for quantities with measures in display mode, with an option to limit the decimal places based on the unit of measure
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the enableAutoColumnWidth and widthIncludingColumnHeader properties in the manifest.json file when adding a column to a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables in the value help dialog are now rendered as responsive tables on mobile devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use a modifer to retrieve the existing PropertyInfo when the Remove condition is called
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a duplicate ID error was shown on a section breakout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also consider the text arrangement annotation when a second filter field with a value help is opened from within a value help dialog
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use messageBundle to set the text for the Upload button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed

item.title: Version 1.134.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.134.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Better styling for Adaptive Card's selectable containers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Visualization of header with Toolbar is improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Fix resizing when card is in a dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Error in the header is now properly displayed when there is no content
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ShellBar: Hide title announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Header's avatar "alt" is now correctly announced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicPage: blank space on snap is no longer visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: fix not read Title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Prevent error when FCL is not rendered
  • Library: sap.fe.controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle backslashes in the Favorite Queries and Last Used Queries of the Easy Filter
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the watchProperty method of the ExtensionAPI to trigger reactions when selected properties are set in the back end
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now explicitly request the message path for static actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer send an overall entity refresh call using the action side effect when requesting a message path
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The Editing Status field in the list report now uses a select control instead of a combo box
    • Type: FIX, Description: Console errors no longer appear upon navigation to the object page in an adaptation project
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables in the value help dialog are now rendered as responsive tables on mobile devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that text binding for an externalID with a semantic object works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also consider the text arrangement annotation when a second filter field with a value help is opened from within a value help dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the Toolbar Configuration dialog where an incorrect label was displayed for the fullscreen action while adapting the table toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a duplicate ID error was shown on a section breakout
    • Type: FIX, Description: The setReadOnly method now works correctly in multi-input fields when readOnly is set to 'false'
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the enableAutoColumnWidth and widthIncludingColumnHeader properties in the manifest.json file when adding a column to a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use a modifer to retrieve the existing PropertyInfo when the Remove condition is called
    • Type: FIX, Description: The RichTextEditor is now correctly displayed in edit mode when an object is created
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the display property of action parameters is correctly calculated using the ValueList reference annotations
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that no message is displayed when a filter isn't applicable to a multi-view table in a list report where the filter bar is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the URL parameter sap-ui-fe-variant-id works as expected
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Selected dates are now visible in all pickers
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.FlexBox: gap, rowGap, and columnGap properties are now added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ColorPalette: The selected color is now set in ColorPicker
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Improvements based on user-testing now implemented
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the uploadProgress and uploadTerminated events for uploadItem within the UploadSetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Improvements based on user-testing now implemented
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Improvements based on user-testing now implemented
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Remove "Units of Time" dropdown for singular option
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MDCTable: Add "Show/Hide Details" state to P13n
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the character list used for file rename validation in the UploadSetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Updated documentation for DateValue
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now mapped the correct UploadSetwithTable Plugin instance when multiple sap.m.Table instances are initialised
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the character list used for file rename validation in the UploadSetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Optimize appointment loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: TokenUpdate event is now fired upon token removal via input
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: fixed cell borders and text selection
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now addressed the height issue that occurred with different zooming levels in the FilePreviewDialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Invisible tokens related exceptions are now prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Named type for escapeHandler property now provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ValueStateMessage: max-width now is set according to specification
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: n-more popover is now not created on initial rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Ensured element in checks
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show a confirmation message after the user discards a draft
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Side effects can now be triggered by custom fields in forms or custom table columns
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added the Share to SAP Collaboration Manager option to the context menu of tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now enable text wrapping for long values in the dropdown of the Editing Status filter field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved some issues that affected the key user's capability to modify table settings in the manifest.json file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've enhanced the key user's ability to modify the smart table and object page layout settings in the manifest.json file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've removed the period from short toast messages
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the messages were not correctly displayed in certain scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with displaying the file uploader button based on the updatable-path property in the annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover displays the message related to the table items correclty, even if the header title for the item page is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display tables defined within the com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.PresentationVariant annotation in the object page section
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of counts on dynamic tiles when dynamic date range filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We'e enabled auto placement for draft popover in the table column to improve text visibility
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the correct height to hide the StackedBarMicroChart label
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where changing the theme did not apply to the interactive donut chart control due to the control not being invalidated after the theme change
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the theme color parameters for the BulletMicroChart to fulfil the minimum contrast requirements
  • Library: sap.tnt

item.title: Version 1.135.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.135.0

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support file uploads as action parameters using the Edm.Stream properties.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: App developers can now enable the optimistic batch with a controller extension by setting disableRequestCache to False in the manifest.json file
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Forms and tables in list reports and object pages now support the Common.Masked annotation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the quickVariantSelection in the Table building block to define multiple views of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define the mass edit functionality as an aggregation in the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the manifest.json file to define custom fragments for a custom list report header
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now call the onBeforeNavigation extension point when Apply is clicked or a sub-object page is closed in flexible column layout applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the Close button of a column in the flexible column layout wasn't displayed after navigating to an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented editing a draft object, and caused the standard error message not to be displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set the correct ValueState on the TextArea during data entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the field validation behaved inconsistently within the flexible column layout applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the table's selection mode when action groups were added
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show all decimals for quantity with measures in display mode
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support file uploads as action parameters using the Edm.Stream properties.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now override the columns, actions, and DataFieldForActionGroup in the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: App developers can now enable the optimistic batch with a controller extension by setting disableRequestCache to False in the manifest.json file
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Forms and tables in list reports and object pages now support the Common.Masked annotation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The Editing Status field in the list report now uses a select control instead of a combo box
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the quickVariantSelection in the Table building block to define multiple views of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've improved the performance of the mass edit dialog by reducing the number of requests when executing bulk changes in isolated mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've enhanced the performance of the mass edit dialog, reducing the opening time for large selections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define the mass edit functionality as an aggregation in the Table building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use the mass edit functionality in fields with side effects
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also filter the value list description using hidden keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now wait for context to be created before extracting the inParameter for the value help dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set the correct ValueState on the TextArea during data entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now drag and resize the create dialog and action parameter dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the navigation link was missing from the quick view title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show all decimals for quantity with measures in display mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support file uploads as action parameters using the Edm.Stream properties.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: App developers can now enable the optimistic batch with a controller extension by setting disableRequestCache to False in the manifest.json file
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The Editing Status field in the list report now uses a select control instead of a combo box
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the manifest.json file to define custom fragments for a custom list report header
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection & DateTimePicker: maxLength attribute added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: DOMPurify: Updated to version 3.2.4
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: List: formsMode keyboard interaction refinements (Revert)
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: List: formsMode keyboard interaction refinements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: segmented button text is not truncated now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: close button in the select drop down is announced now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: icons are displayed correctly in HCB and HCW themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: whole text is shown in popup footer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeField: Align both value state messages
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: remove focus of suggestion item
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use messageBundle to set the text for the Upload button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Do not collapse tokenizer after input
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitApp: Fix text page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.LightBox: Initial focus is now set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Fix dialog acc text page
    • Type: FIX, Description: ListBase: Remove RangeSelection on onItemContextMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Fix documentation related to the "N-more" link
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls with Suggestions: Value State message in header is no longer focusable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Speech output for table suggestions is now enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Fix failing qUnit tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap banner issue in OneByOne type genericTile and we've also removed the application of active state color of the banner
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fix issue when in OFT's Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: TimePicker part now is properly initialized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Closing animation is now working properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PullToRefresh: Fix failing test on 2.0
    • Type: FIX, Description: File rename will fire the itemRenamed event on completion & will not trigger model updates in UploadsetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove warning message
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Scrolling issue in popover with overflowing content is now resolved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The 'Show More Per Row' setting in a table is now saved in the inner application state
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've improved the format of the browser tab title for SAP Fiori elements applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with filtering on multi-view and multi-table applications when table filters are applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where action buttons on the object page header, including the Edit button, were not visible when a subobject page was loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the Add Custom Page Action option in the Adaptation Editor
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that when side effect logic is triggered for a smart field, SAP Fiori elements proceeds with field group generation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the back navigation button from the message dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the Add Subpage action in the adaptation project when legacy manifest file is used
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Update visual design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: fix firing of press event in popover items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: visual test is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: documentation is adjusted for Overlay mode sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Selected state without icon is fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.FilterBar: Buttons are now visible on 320px screen size
    • Type: FIX, Description: FlexibilityDelegate: Fields with Common.Text only should be included
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: correctly set async created operations as value
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Binding context for fixed-value scenarios is now synchronized
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: showDetails is now persisted after settings dialog is opened
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue where the backend call was null for smartMultiInput
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: KeyboardInteractionEndpoint: Don't log error on each postmessage
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceBundle: Log async create error / throw in future versions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.autoWaiter: QUnit stabilized
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: no caching of metadata with cache buster segment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.ShortcutHintsMixin: shows correctly the tooltip on mouseover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test: Fix failing test on 2.0
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: DataTables improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Integration test cookie cleaup improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Deprecated API usage replaced
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Datatables improved
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Card Explorer: Events from previous card sample are no longer displayed on the current
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Improved showCard method
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnLayout: render as <dl> in display mode
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: opening dropdown selects first item
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: closing token-popover looses focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC.ValueHelp: Reconfigure ValueHelp on defaultRow in _updateRow
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: old Typeahed item announced by arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC.ValueHelp: Popover promise handling improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Boolean default help - no title on phone
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: fix failing qUnit tests on Firefox
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarTimeInterval: is displayed correctly now
  • Library: sap.ui.vk
    • Type: FIX, Description: Recompute outline geometry for mesh when geometry streamed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Callout texture disappears after selection, incorrect highlighting
    • Type: FIX, Description: animation time slider behaviour in viewer.
    • Type: FIX, Description: Visibility issue with zero transition duration between views
    • Type: FIX, Description: Colored vertices loading issue
  • Library: sap.ushell
    • Type: FIX, Description: HomepageManager: Update Tile Size in Classic Homepage's Model
    • Type: FIX, Description: FLP Settings Dialog: Number Format field enabled despite CUA
    • Type: FIX, Description: Broken SmartLinks in iframe applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: iframe handling for non stateful iframes
    • Type: FIX, Description: Allow theme changing in appruntime by default
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSectionBase: API for effective title level
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Fix not showing "moreBlocks"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Header padding fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect selectedSection prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Fix failing QUnit on 2.0
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.fe.macros.field.Field#undefined] Use {@link sap.fe.macros.Field } instead
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.ValueCSSColor#undefined] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.sac.df.model.MultiDimModel#getGridStylingTemplateRegistry] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.tnt.IToolHeader#undefined] This interface is not needed anymore. The <code>ToolPage</code> now accepts any control as a header or subheader.

item.title: Version 1.134.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.134.0

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option to add a background to the labels of circular nodes to enhance the visibilty of the labels
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a Tooltip can be added for a Network Graph node
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the screen reader announcement issue for micro process flow control

item.title: Version 1.136.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Card: Header Info Section is now implemented
  • Library: sap.fe.base
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure using a binding expression for the readOnly property in the Field building block works correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Tree tables now support the copy and paste functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've added the IsDeltaUpdate parameter in the ShareAction annotation batch to add further security measures to the collaborative draft feature
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now include the AI icon for AI actions in both annotation-based buttons and extension buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the semanticObject and readOnly properties in the manifest.json file for the Field building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've introduced the MessageButton building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've introduced a Page Building Block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Revert - We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps"
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now notify end users if the WebSocket connection is closed while requesting side effects
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've defined a new format for the page title displayed in the browser tab for OData V4 apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider filter and sort restrictions in table personalization in a containment scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: Inline actions of FieldGroups from navigation properties now have the correct binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now add navigation parameters when a link is opened in a new tab using the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with setting a dynamic semantic object in the Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where end users were unable to save an object correctly after enabling recommendations in sticky apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the strict handling dialog when an action returns a single warning message with a description or descriptionUrl
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now determine the visibility of a facet by the UI.Hidden annotation first, followed by whether all the facet's contents are hidden.
  • Library: sap.fe.ina
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Tree tables now support the copy and paste functionality

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the semanticObject and readOnly properties in the manifest.json file for the Field building block

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've introduced a Page Building Block

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the EditState filter didn’t behave correctly when used inside nested MultiFilters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the textFromValueList property is correctly used as fallback text for the field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where manifest settings weren't applied to charts on the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure using a binding expression for the readOnly property in the Field building block works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the title of a section is visible when the section has multiple subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use the correct HTTP request method for file uploads in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support case-sensitive filtering in tables within the value help dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: Multi-input fields now work correctly when readOnly is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with setting a dynamic semantic object in the Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the API documentation for the Table building block to support the group option in the table personalization for both responsive and analytical tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the Continue button not working in the Create dialog because of the transient binding context
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now determine the visibility of a facet by the UI.Hidden annotation first, followed by whether all the facet's contents are hidden.
    • Type: FIX, Description: The More button of multi-input fields is now displayed correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved the performance of the mass edit dialog by reducing the number of requests when executing side effect actions

item.title: Version 1.136.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that share links are correctly generated when adaptShareMetadata is overriden twice in a custom code
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the state of the flexible column layout wasn't stored correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that messages are correctly handled when data is copied and pasted from external applications into tables
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that quick views can be opened from fields with criticality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly validate conditions for 1:n property paths that are set using the setFilterValues API
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now configure the exportRequestSize parameter in tree and analytical tables using the Table building block or manifest.json file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the Table building block API that prevented showing or hiding columns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarRow: custom header row background on hover is correct now
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct download parameter is set while downloading uploaded items using the table's download functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the image inside a slide tile is adjusted based on the width of the tile
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: zero guid is not exposed in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: Column menu ignores displayBehaviour without description
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Enhance Interaction Protocol for translation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use getter from prototype for 'nodeName'
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerMetadata.qunit: registerExtensionProvider deprecation
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where ContextBasedAdaptationsAPI.create does not consider manifest and annotation changes
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: show more-indicator on focus to other field
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix table flickering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: prevent duplicate ID error
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix visibility of title IconTabBar mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: ensure consistent async unstashing

item.title: Version 1.136.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the list report with a multi-input field displayed an error message when a draft was discarded in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed correctly when a MultiValueField is changed in a table
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the resizing of the overflow toolbar
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the unit of measure associated with the field in the smart link popover title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the AI-assisted Easy Filter did not correctly handle the Between (BT) and Not Between (NB) conditions, resulting in undefined values for the range
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the format of Between' (BT) operator is correctly maintained in the search metadata of the AI-assisted Easy Filter
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Mdc.FieldBase: Mark keydown event on escape-induced valuehelp close
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Action visualization issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix cloning of "actions"
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: Correct month and time calculation errors caused by numericFormatter

item.title: Version 1.136.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.3

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now identify the startup parameters when an SAP Fiori elements application is launched as an embedded application from My Inbox
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Summarize button is not adaptable in key user adaptation
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartChart: Control property is removed from SmartLink
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with editing the object page after performing a multi edit on the same record from the list report
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default

item.title: Version 1.136.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved the logic to correctly extract SmartLink metadata for populating the navigation popover's title and description
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support text-based search for value help in the AI-assisted easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help metadata is loaded before the value help dialog opens in the AI-assisted easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the contact facet displays correctly even when the email field is left empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the object page stopped responding due to incorrect error message handling
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: now semantic dates are restored properly in personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: TextArrangement handling for NavigationProperty and TextOnly scenarios has been enhanced

item.title: Version 1.136.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.5

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page

    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with duplicate IDs when multiple changes were made for the same field using UI adaptation

    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add polyfill for Promise.withResolvers
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Derive dist version from preloaded CSS URL
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: handle shadow DOM as opener
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if measure part is integer, set decimals to '0'
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters

  • Library: sap.ui.integration

  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.6

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve removed incorrect ARIA labels that were assigned to the footer of an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the text of AI-assisted easy filter tokens didn’t reflect the text arrangement of the selected value help entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the smart filter bar variant didn't reflect changes to the semantic date range fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: The correct ARIA label is now assigned to Object page header forms

item.title: Version 1.138.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.138.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: fix headerContentLabel upon snap/unsnap
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now add print and export options to the Share menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now freeze columns in the Column Settings dialog and disable column freezing by using the disableColumnFreeze parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now attach event handlers to the list binding of tables and retrieve the row count.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with grouping conditions in responsive tables that use analytical services
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with sort and filter restrictions in table personalization in a containment scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with invoking the DefaultValuesFunction on list bindings that include navigation paths
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that share links are correctly generated when adaptShareMetadata is overriden twice in a custom code
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the state of the flexible column layout wasn't stored correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use ReadOnly and Mandatory as FieldControl annotations for multi-input fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now add print and export options to the Share menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now freeze columns in the Column Settings dialog and disable column freezing by using the disableColumnFreeze parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now attach event handlers to the list binding of tables and retrieve the row count.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the cut and copy enablement logic when multiple rows were selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that variant selection works correctly in tables with multiple views defined with different entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that quick views can be opened from fields with criticality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use ReadOnly and Mandatory as FieldControl annotations for multi-input fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that variant selection works correctly in tables with multiple views defined with different entity sets
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: endContent documentation is now updated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MenuItem: Add aria-expanded attribute
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: does not work with negative numbers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: text is displayed with small letter
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu auto-closing in some cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: make binding higher prio
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now replaced the instanceof check for promises sent to itemValidationHandler with thenable check to handle the pollyfilled promises in UploadSetwithTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Aligned English translation texts
    • Type: FIX, Description: QueryPanel: move item looses focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: Illustration Explorer: Fix deprecated illustrations handling and integration tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed rowHeaderPress event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Update reset announce message for the screen reader
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove overriden setter for property multipleAppointmentsSelection since the functionality was moved in onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotofictionListGroup: Press is fired on enter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Default button has correct hover color
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
