    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning when only oordinates are provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Font rendering issue in Safari is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Typo fixed jsdoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Reset action announcement added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the decorative property of avatar to true for action tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct color in info toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: CSS classes are propagated to the submenus
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: MenuWrapper does not throw JS error when trying to close submenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: prevent Firefox warning by avoiding getElementById with empty ID
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the AI-assisted Easy Filter did not correctly handle the Between (BT) and Not Between (NB) conditions, resulting in undefined values for the range
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the format of Between (BT) operator is correctly maintained in the search metadata of the AI-assisted Easy Filter

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now load the RuntimeAuthoring library when key user adaptation is started
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Boolean values are set in the correct format in the initial metadata of the AI-assisted Easy Filter
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: prevent focus loss on popover close and reopen
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarRightItems: fix unstable tests

    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generated filters are now removed from service query
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Empty SmartField now has correct announcement when used in SmartTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Separator is now at correct position
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: DescriptionOnly paste uses correct type instance
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu

    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of inconsistent decimal digits shown in the smart charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: inconsistent mandatory indicator

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: WebComponents - make base classes non-experimental

    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Allow module github links to OpenUI5 modules
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: APIREF Module link fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: ExportDialog: Apply file type only with actual type change
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app

  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated

item.title: Version 1.139.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.139.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Column resize using Up and Down keys enabled
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards now reuse destinations from main card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Manifest Resolver sample is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: CardVariants test page is fixed
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now navigate to a specific object page in an app with multiple entity sets
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now use a single batch request when an operation is executed for multiple items
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set a horizontal layout for a group of checkboxes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support checkbox groups in forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now hide FormElements when the visibility of all contained fields is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the list report with a multi-input field displayed an error message when a draft was discarded in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed correctly when a MultiValueField is changed in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the deletion of parent and child nodes
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set a horizontal layout for a group of checkboxes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support checkbox groups in forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: Undefined values in the value help table are now shown as empty cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the resizing of the overflow toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with data loading in the value help dropdown
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the use of UploadSetwithTable plugin in the Tree Table control

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: retain the minimum height of the empty placeholder

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: introduce "level" and "titleStyle" properties to sap.m.PlanningCalendar header title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Focus issue prevented

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed

  • Library: sap.tnt
